left","selector":"","trigger":"hover focus","delay":0,"container":"body"}}}); var HBDEBUG=getParameterByName('adtech_debug');var HBSTART=(new Date()).getTime();var TIMEOUT=2000;var googletag=googletag||{};googletag.cmd=googletag.cmd||[];(function($){logHB('START');var jwt=getCookie('patch_secret');var user=jwt?parseJwt(jwt):null;var isMember=user?user.member:null;var membership_enable=Drupal.settings.client_ads_dfp.membership_enable;var membership=(membership_enable)?isMember:0;var deviceType=getDeviceType();var all_ad_units=Drupal.settings.client_ads_dfp.ad_units;var ad_targeting=Drupal.settings.client_ads_dfp.ad_targeting;var requestManager={adserverRequestSent:false,enabledBidders:[],returnedBidders:[],allBiddersBack:function(){return this.returnedBidders.length===this.enabledBidders.length;},bidsBackForBidder:function(bidder){logHB('bidsBackForBidder: '+bidder);if(this.adserverRequestSent){logHB('bidsBackForBidder: already sent');return;}this.returnedBidders.push(bidder);if(this.allBiddersBack()){this.sendAdserverRequest();}},sendAdserverRequest:function(){logHB('sendAdserverRequest');logHB('sendAdserverRequest: bidders returned = '+this.returnedBidders.toString());if(this.adserverRequestSent){logHB('sendAdserverRequest: [WARNING] already sent');return;}this.adserverRequestSent=true;googletag.cmd.push(function(){if(Drupal.settings.client_ads_dfp.prebid_enable & ){pbjs.setTargetingForGPTAsync();}logHB("pubads().refresh()");googletag.pubads().refresh();});}};googletag.cmd.push(function(){logHB('starting main ad logic');adjustAdSlots();setupAdUnits();if(Drupal.settings.client_ads_dfp.amazon_enable){requestManager.enabledBidders.push('a9');defineAndFetchAmazonAds();}if(Drupal.settings.client_ads_dfp.prebid_enable){requestManager.enabledBidders.push('prebid');defineAndFetchPrebidAds();}logHB('googletag :',googletag);for(name in ad_targeting){googletag.pubads().setTargeting(name,ad_targeting[name]);}if(membership==1){googletag.pubads().setTargeting('user','member');}var single_request=Drupal.settings.client_ads_dfp.client_ads_dfp_enable_single_request;if(single_request){googletag.pubads().enableSingleRequest();}var collapse=Drupal.settings.client_ads_dfp.client_ads_dfp_collapse_empty_divs;if(collapse==='true'){googletag.pubads().collapseEmptyDivs();}var first_refresh=Drupal.settings.client_ads_dfp.first_refresh;if(first_refresh){googletag.pubads().disableInitialLoad();}googletag.enableServices();logHB('starting global adwrapper timeout');window.setTimeout(function(){if(requestManager.allBiddersBack()){return;}else{logHB('global timeout exceeded. sending ad server requests for what we have')requestManager.sendAdserverRequest();}},TIMEOUT);});function defineAndFetchPrebidAds(){logHB('defineAndFetchPrebidAds');var PREBID_TIMEOUT=Drupal.settings.client_ads_dfp.prebid_timeout;var prebid_multiplier=parseFloat(Drupal.settings.client_ads_dfp.prebid_multiplier);var prebid_adder=parseFloat(Drupal.settings.client_ads_dfp.prebid_adder);var ga_enabled=Drupal.settings.client_ads_dfp.ga_enable;var ga_sampling_value=parseFloat(Drupal.settings.client_ads_dfp.ga_sampling);var adUnits=constructPrebidAdUnits(all_ad_units);logHB('pbjs_adUnits',adUnits);logHB('mobile_detect',mobile_detect);pbjs.addAdUnits(adUnits);if(ga_enabled){pbjs.que.push(function(){pbjs.enableAnalytics([{provider:'ga',options:{enableDistribution:false,sampling:ga_sampling_value}}])});}var customConfigObject={"buckets":[{"precision":2,"min":0,"max":20,"increment":0.05},{"precision":2,"min":20,"max":50,"increment":1.00}]};pbjs.setConfig({priceGranularity:customConfigObject});pbjs.setConfig({disableAjaxTimeout:true});pbjs.setConfig({debug:false});pbjs.bidderSettings={standard:{adserverTargeting:[{key:"hb_bidder",val:function(bidResponse){return bidResponse.bidderCode;}},{key:"hb_adid",val:function(bidResponse){return bidResponse.adId;}},{key:"hb_pb",val:function(bidResponse){return bidResponse.pbCg;}},{key:"hb_size",val:function(bidResponse){return bidResponse.size;}},{key:"hb_deal",val:function(bidResponse){return bidResponse.dealId;}},{key:"hb_source",val:function(bidResponse){return bidResponse.source;}},{key:"hb_format",val:function(bidResponse){return bidResponse.mediaType;}}],bidCpmAdjustment:function(bidCpm,bid){var modified_bid=((bidCpm*prebid_multiplier)+prebid_adder);logHB("bidder: "+bid.bidderCode+", adUnit: "+bid.adUnitCode+", CPM: "+bidCpm+", modified CPM: "+modified_bid);return modified_bid;}},ix:{adserverTargeting:[{key:"hb_deal_IX",val:function(bidResponse){return bidResponse.dealId;}}],}}pbjs.requestBids({bidsBackHandler:function(bidResponses){requestManager.bidsBackForBidder("prebid");if(HBDEBUG){logHB(bidResponses);logHB('pbjs_timeout: '+PREBID_TIMEOUT);logHB('pbjs_bidResponses');for(var key in bidResponses){if(!bidResponses.hasOwnProperty(key))continue;var obj=bidResponses[key];for(var prop in obj){if(!obj.hasOwnProperty(prop))continue;logHB('bids for '+key+" = "+obj[prop].length,obj[prop]);}}}},timeout:+PREBID_TIMEOUT});pbjs.que.push(function(){logHB('pbjs object:',pbjs);logHB('adUnits: ',adUnits);});}function fetchA9Bids(az_slots,timeoutA9){logHB('fetchA9Bids');if(az_slots.length){googletag.cmd.push(function(){apstag.fetchBids({slots:az_slots,timeout:timeoutA9},function(bids){logHB('about to call setDisplayBids()');apstag.setDisplayBids();requestManager.bidsBackForBidder("a9");});});}}function defineAndFetchAmazonAds(){logHB('defineAndFetchAmazonAds');var amazon_client_id=Drupal.settings.fe_amazonads.id;var timeout=Number(Drupal.settings.fe_amazonads.timeout);if(!all_ad_units){return false;}var az_slots=[];for(unit in all_ad_units){var slot=all_ad_units[unit];if(slot.ad_media===deviceType){var adobj={};adobj.slotID=unit;adobj.sizes=slot.ad_size_arr;az_slots.push(adobj);}}if(az_slots.length){apstag.init({pubID:amazon_client_id,adServer:'googletag'});fetchA9Bids(az_slots,timeout);}}function available yet  var jwt = getCookie('patch_secret');  var user = jwt ? parseJwt(jwt) : null;  if (user) {    var puid = user.user_id;    if (puid) {      ga('set', 'userId', puid.toString()); Log in 50 F Post Advertise       Nearby       Dublin, CA Livermore, CA San Ramon, CA Union City, CA Fremont, CA Castro Valley, CA Danville, CA Newark, CA San Leandro, CA Milpitas, CA           Local News           Community Crime  &  Safety Politics  &  Government Schools Traffic  &  Transit Obituaries Personal Finance Weather Arts  &  Entertainment Business Health Home  &  Garden Sports Travel Kids  &  Family Pets Restaurants  &  Bars Local Directory LocalStream Town Info Neighbor Posts Classifieds Calendar Real Estate Subscribe See All Places Nearby Places  Dublin, CA  Livermore, CA  San Ramon, CA  Union City, CA  Fremont, CA  Castro Valley, CA  Danville, CA  Newark, CA  San Leandro, CA  Milpitas, CA State Edition  California National Edition  Top National News  See All Places Best Holiday Gifts For Kids 2019         This post was contributed by a community member. The views expressed here are the author's own.       A 69-year-old Pleasanton man was arrested Tuesday on suspicion of possessing and distributing  child pornography , according to the Pleasanton Police Department . Multiple computers purportedly containing illegal images were seized after a search warrant was served at a residence on the 5000 block of Monaco Drive, police said. The suspect, who appears to be an amateur photographer based on his various web sites, was scheduled for arraignment last week at the  Gale-Schenone Hall of Justice  in Pleasanton on felony charges of possessing and/or distributing obscene materials depicting minors. According to court records, he was released from custody after posting $60,000 bail. The investigation, referred from the  Martinez Police Department , is ongoing, police said. In other police news: Saturday, Jan. 21 Friday, Jan. 20 Thursday, Jan. 19 Wednesday, Jan. 18 Tuesday, Jan. 17  Monday, Jan. 16 Sunday, Jan. 15           Patch is a space for neighborhood news.
